name: Butternut Squash Bisque
recipeCategory: dinner, one pot, soups and stews
keywords: butternut squash, chicken stock, onion, fall, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 large butternut squash, peeled, seeded and diced
1 bouquet garni (parsley sprig, bay leaf, sprig thyme, 5 peppercorns wrapped in cheesecloth)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the squash, shallots, onion, pepper, nutmeg, garlic, bouquet garni and chicken stock in a large saucepan. Cook over medium heat until the squash is tender, about 20 minutes. Drain, reserving the liquid, discard the bouquet garni and puree in a food processor.

Melt the butter in a heavy saucepan. Whisk in the flour, and cook over low heat for 5 minutes, whisking constantly. Gradually whisk in the reserved cooking liquid, and bring to a boil; then, stirring constantly, add the squash puree.
Stir in the half-and-half, and season with salt and pepper. Garnish each serving with a sprinkling of freshly ground nutmeg.
